snippet: American International Group, the insurance giant, said the deal is part of a plan to repurchase $5 billion worth of its own stock from the United States government.
abstract: American International Group, the insurance giant, said the deal is part of a plan to repurchase $5 billion worth of its own stock from the United States government.

headline.main: A.I.G. to Sell $2 Billion Stake in Asia Unit for Share Buyback
